name: Fuzzland
description:
This is Fuzzland, only with one island so far, a place where cute little fuzzballs kill each other for domination over an island

You are the big Red Fuzz fighting through an island of tiny blue fuzzballs to ensure domination for your kind.

SO WHAT IS THIS GAME?:

This game is a small platformer shooter for now, but with a little tactical twitch to it, you can get shot 4 times, but for every time you get shot you walk slower due to injury and after the fourth shot you die and you can also take cover behind certain objects so that is basically it for now

FUTURE PLANS:

More islands, More Fuzzball types, Destructible  buildings, Friendly fuzzballs, Vehicles, Game modes, and so much more! 

CONTROLS:

Left click = Shoot

Mouse = Look around

Space = Jump

E = Take Cover/ Get out of cover

A, D = Move around

BUGS:

A phew small problems with fading in and out, and sometimes the Player's gun is upside down but just moving your mouse around quickly should fix it

This game was also made for the Indiepocalypse game jam

ENJOY!!!
